AI Impact on the Pragmatic Framework's 37 Boxes

Every activity in Pragmatic Institute's product lifecycle framework ‚Äî evaluated for AI replacement probability with tool recommendations and real-world evidence.

Competitive Landscape Market ‚ñæ
Pragmatic Definition

"Identify competitive and alternative offerings in the market. Assess their strengths and weaknesses. Develop a strategy for winning against the competition."

AI Impact Analysis

AI can continuously monitor competitors, scrape pricing pages, track product updates, analyze positioning shifts, and generate competitive battle cards in real time ‚Äî far faster and more comprehensively than any human analyst.

Recommended AI Tools
CrayonReal-time competitive monitoring with AI-generated battlecards and Slack alerts
KlueCompetitive enablement platform with AI-powered intel curation for sales teams
VisualpingAutomated website change detection for competitor pricing and messaging shifts
AlphaSenseAI-powered market intelligence across filings, transcripts, and news
üì∞ Evidence & Sources
Blackbaud's PMM reports Klue's Compete Agent saves 2 days/week and increased win rates 28% against top competitors‚Üó Klue
Community Brands achieved 10% win rate lift and 50% reduction in PMM time to find/distribute competitive insights‚Üó Klue Case Study
Klue's AI generates complete battlecards in under 60 seconds from verified intel sources‚Üó Klue Blog
92%
Content Enablement ‚ñæ
Pragmatic Definition

"Provide content for buyer personas focused on a specific step of the buying process. Curate content aligned with stages of the buying process."

AI Impact Analysis

AI can generate buyer-persona-specific content mapped to buying stages at scale. Organizations report 30-50% reduction in content creation time. Human role shifts to editorial curation and brand voice governance.

Recommended AI Tools
JasperBrand-trained AI content generation across formats with campaign workflows
WriterEnterprise AI writing with brand voice and compliance governance
Claude / ChatGPTLong-form drafting, repurposing launch docs into multi-channel assets
DescriptAI video/audio editing to repurpose webinars into short-form clips
üì∞ Evidence & Sources
Bain & Company (2025): organizations using generative AI for marketing see 30-50% decrease in content creation time‚Üó Bain via Cirrus Insight
29% of marketing teams now produce over half their content with AI; small teams average 71% AI-generated‚Üó Walnut
91%
Nurturing Programs ‚ñæ
Pragmatic Definition

"Develop a lead nurturing process to turn prospects into satisfied customers and upsell or cross-sell existing customers."

AI Impact Analysis

Lead nurture sequences, drip campaigns, personalized follow-ups, and scoring models are increasingly automated end-to-end. AI optimizes timing, messaging, and channel selection dynamically based on behavioral signals.

Recommended AI Tools
HubSpot AIAI lead scoring, email personalization, and automated nurture workflows
6senseIntent-based buyer identification and AI-orchestrated campaigns
Drift / SalesloftConversational AI chatbots that qualify and nurture leads 24/7
90%
Sales Tools Enablement ‚ñæ
Pragmatic Definition

"Create tools for salespeople focused on a specific step of the selling process."

AI Impact Analysis

Battle cards, one-pagers, ROI calculators, objection handlers, and demo scripts can all be generated and personalized by AI for specific deal contexts.

Recommended AI Tools
HighspotAI-powered content recommendations and sales play automation
SeismicDynamic content assembly and personalized sales collateral generation
GongConversation intelligence that surfaces winning talk tracks
WalnutAI-powered interactive demo personalization per persona/deal stage
89%
Measurement Programs ‚ñæ
Pragmatic Definition

"Measure and tune product efforts to ensure alignment with corporate goals."

AI Impact Analysis

Tracking KPIs, attributing pipeline to programs, anomaly detection, and performance reporting are natural AI strengths. AI dashboards surface insights humans would miss.

Recommended AI Tools
ImprovadoAI Agent lets marketers query unified data in plain English
Power BI CopilotConversational data analysis and auto-generated narratives
DataboxAI-powered KPI tracking with anomaly alerts
88%
Asset Assessment Market ‚ñæ
AI Impact Analysis

Cataloging technical assets, patents, skills inventories, and identifying leverage opportunities is a classification and pattern-matching task AI excels at.

Recommended AI Tools
GleanAI enterprise search across all internal documents and knowledge bases
GuruAI knowledge management that surfaces relevant internal assets
PatSnapAI patent analytics for IP portfolio assessment
85%
Use Scenarios Planning ‚ñæ
AI Impact Analysis

Given persona data and market research, AI generates detailed day-in-the-life scenarios, user stories, and problem-context narratives. Synthetic user research supplements real interviews.

Recommended AI Tools
Claude / ChatGPTGenerate day-in-the-life scenarios from persona docs
Synthetic UsersAI-generated personas for rapid scenario testing
Dovetail AISynthesize qualitative research into themes

Programs (Support) Support ‚ñæ
Why AI Won't Replace This

This requires organizational navigation, cross-team trust, and translating market intelligence into actionable direction.

38%
Stakeholder Communications Planning ‚ñæ
Why AI Won't Replace This

Reading political dynamics, building coalitions, knowing what to share with whom ‚Äî rooted in EQ and influence AI can't replicate.

35%
Innovation Business ‚ñæ
Why AI Won't Replace This

AI brainstorms and generates ideas. Creative leaps, risk tolerance, and vision to drive innovation are fundamentally human.

32%
Advocacy Programs ‚ñæ
Why AI Won't Replace This

Authentic relationship-building, trust, and making customers feel valued. Reference calls are human-to-human exchanges.

30%
Distinctive Competencies Market ‚ñæ
Why AI Won't Replace This

Requires deep institutional knowledge and strategic self-awareness. AI can help articulate once identified, but can't discover what makes you unique.

20%
Events Support ‚ñæ
Why AI Won't Replace This

Physical presence, improvisation, reading a room, and authentic connection. The most AI-resistant activity in the entire framework.
